history.narrative: Law 2-142 was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 2-11, which was referred to the Committee on Government Operations. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on October 17, 1978 and October 31, 1978, respectively. Vetoed by the Mayor on November 27, 1978, and enacted without signature on December 12, 1978, it was assigned Act No. 2-312 and transmitted to both Houses of Congress for its review.
